summary: Complete pre-deploy testing of Tabatinga2Surf system. All features working correctly: Homepage with weather/tides/moon phases, responsive navbar, products listing, cart functionality, login/dashboard, and surfboard rental management. Backend APIs 100% passing (14/14 tests). Frontend 100% functional.

issues: Some products show 'Sem imagem' placeholder - consider adding product images for better UX

features_tested.details: Shows 28°C correctly with expandable section showing Temperatura, Sensação, Vento, Umidade
Expandable section shows tide times: 06:30 (alta 2.3m), 12:45 (baixa 0.5m), 18:50 (alta 2.1m)
Expandable section shows Lua Nova, Quarto Crescente, Lua Cheia, Quarto Minguante
All links visible: Início, Clima, Marés, Luas, Produtos, Login, Cart
Hamburger menu correctly hidden on desktop, visible on mobile (390x844)
All links work: Início, Clima, Marés, Luas, Produtos, Login
Lists 4 products with category filters (Todos, acessorios, surf, bodyboard, mergulho)
Shows product info, price, stock, and Add to Cart button
Add to cart, quantity controls (+/-), remove item, cart total calculation all working
Login with admin/admin123 works, redirects to dashboard
Shows 19 surfboards with hourly rates and Iniciar buttons
Start rental modal opens with renter name, estimated time, and calculated value
Links to Gerenciar Pranchas, Galeria, Histórico, Gerenciar Produtos, Configurações
Sair button logs out and redirects to homepage
Returns temp=28, feels_like=30, humidity=75, wind_speed=3.5, source=estimado
Returns 3 tide entries for Tabatinga, PB
Returns 4 products with full CRUD support
Returns 19 surfboards with full CRUD support
Authentication working with admin/admin123
Full rental flow tested: start, pause, resume, complete

context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working. Weather and Tides APIs return MOCKED/estimated data (OPENWEATHER_API_KEY not configured, tabuademares.com returns 403). Login credentials: admin/admin123. 19 surfboards and 4 products in database.

mocked_apis_list: /api/weather - Returns estimated data (temp=28°C) when OPENWEATHER_API_KEY not set
/api/tides - Returns fallback data (tabuademares.com API returns 403 Forbidden)
